Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won by 6 wickets with 9 balls remaining.
Wanindu Hasaranga was named Player of the Match for his 3/13 performance.
Dhananjaya de Silva scored an unbeaten 66 off 42 balls.
Rashid Khan took 2 wickets for 31 runs.
Mujeeb Ur Rahman took 2 wickets for 24 runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan elected to bat first after winning the toss.
Match was held at Brisbane Cricket Ground, Woolloongabba, Brisbane.
Sri Lanka earned 2 points from the match.
Sri Lanka chased down the target in 18.3 overs, scoring 148/4.
